metaDescription: Choose the membership that suits you best. Unlimited yoga, workshops and exclusive member benefits.
title: Memberships
description: Choose the membership that suits you best and start your yoga journey with us

termFeatures.recoveryCredits: Cancelled classes become credits for any class

management.title: Manage Membership

actions.warningDescription: Changes to your membership are permanent and cannot be undone.
actions.pauseDescription: Temporarily pause your membership and resume later

management.confirmPause: Are you sure you want to pause your membership?

recoveryCredits.title: Recovery Credits
recoveryCredits.howToGet: Cancel a booked class to receive recovery credits

info.title: About Recovery Credits
info.description: Use these credits to book any available class

termBooking.selectClassType: Choose which type of yoga class you want to attend during the term:
termBooking.selectTermStart: Select which date the term should start (Mondays):
termBooking.reviewSessions: You will be automatically booked for {total} classes. Uncheck classes you cannot attend:
termBooking.selectSessions: Select {required} classes for the term ({selected} selected)
termBooking.paymentNote: You will be redirected to secure payment

success.confirmationEmail: You will soon receive a confirmation email with information about your membership.

freeWorkshops.title: Free workshops
freeWorkshops.description: Access selected workshops and special classes

priorityBooking.title: Priority booking
priorityBooking.description: Book classes earlier than drop-in participants

memberEvents.title: Member events
memberEvents.description: Exclusive events and gatherings for members

guestPasses.title: Guest passes
guestPasses.description: Bring a friend for free a few times per year

studioDiscounts.title: Studio discounts
studioDiscounts.description: 10% off retreats and retail in the studio

faq.title: Common questions about memberships
faq.description: Have questions about our memberships? We've collected answers to the most common questions.

termCheckout.selectClassTypeDescription: You will practice {count} times per week for {weeks} weeks
termCheckout.selectSessions: Select {count} sessions for the first week
termCheckout.patternDescription: This schedule will be used as a template for the remaining weeks
termCheckout.patternWillBeApplied: This pattern will be applied to {weeks} remaining weeks
termCheckout.autoResolveConflicts: Automatically find alternatives if the same time is not available
termCheckout.reviewAndResolve: Review the results and resolve any conflicts
termCheckout.confirmDescription: You're about to reserve {count} classes for your term
termCheckout.reservationDescription: Your spots will be held during payment. If you don't complete the purchase, they'll be automatically released.
termCheckout.paymentNote: You will be redirected to secure payment

termSuccess.metaTitle: Thank You for Your Purchase - Term Pass | Yoga Stenungsund
termSuccess.metaDescription: Your term pass is now active and all your selected classes are booked.
termSuccess.title: Thank you for your purchase!
termSuccess.subtitle: Your term pass is now active
termSuccess.allSessionsBooked: All your selected classes for the term are now automatically booked
termSuccess.emailConfirmation: You will receive an email confirmation with all your bookings
termSuccess.manageBookings: You can cancel individual classes and receive recovery credits

weeklySchedule.selectionComplete: Perfect! You've selected all your sessions for this week
weeklySchedule.selectionInstructions: Choose {count, plural, =1 {# class} other {# classes}} you'd like to attend this week
weeklySchedule.selectMore: {count, plural, =1 {Select # more class to continue} other {Select # more classes to continue}}
weeklySchedule.smartTipDescription: Choose times that work well for your routine. We'll try to book the same times for the remaining weeks of your term.
weeklySchedule.varietyTip: Tip: Pick a variety of times to explore different classes and instructors

checkout.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
checkout.receiptTooltip: Need a receipt for wellness benefits? Fill in details here for your receipt.

checkout.addReceiptDetailsBelow: Add receipt details below if needed

errors.checkoutFailed: Failed to create checkout session. Please try again.

management.title: Manage Membership

actions.warningDescription: Changes to your membership take effect immediately and cannot be undone.
actions.pauseDescription: Temporarily pause your membership. You'll keep your credits and can resume anytime.
actions.resumeDescription: Reactivate your paused membership and continue where you left off.
actions.cancelDescription: Permanently cancel your membership. This action cannot be undone.

management.confirmPause: Are you sure you want to pause your membership?
management.confirmResume: Are you sure you want to resume your membership?
management.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your membership? This action cannot be undone.
